nodes.text: The Hyrotii Corporation was a vehicle-manufacturing company that produced the ComfortRide Passenger Airspeeder and the EasyRide passenger airspeeder. The ComfortRide was designed with comfort and security as priorities, while the EasyRide was cheaper and less luxurious. Both speeders were used frequently on the planet Coruscant during the final decades of the Galactic Republic.

The Hyrotii Corporation first appeared in Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars Encyclopedia of Starfighters and Other Vehicles, which was written by Landry Q. Walker. It originated in the Star Wars Legends reference book Cracken's Rebel Operatives, a 1994 supplement to Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, which was produced by West End Games.
